info.description:
Too busy with Uni and life stuff to work on this + there's some site redesign on the way. Will update once I have time.

info.additionalInfo:
There are various little annoying inconsistencies through the site I'm having difficulty in properly styling, especially on the forums. You'll probably notice them troughout the site as you use this. Too lazy to throw together a list of them for the time being, feel free to contact me through PM on the HB forums if you notice anything that's off.

https://forums.hummingbird.me/users/Zoey

There are also some design choices I have made that everyone will not agree with, such as blocking emoji, shortening profile cover photos, and ditching anime/manga ones entirely. In a later version I'll have these sections clearly marked so you can change them if you want.
